meanings.definition: A person who runs naked in a public place for a short distance.
meanings.sent1: The streakers caused quite a commotion at the football game.
meanings.sent2: The police chased down the streakers who disrupted the event.
meanings.sent3: The streakers surprised everyone with their bold sprint.
meanings.sent4: The streakers painted the town with their daring run.
meanings.sent5: The image of the streakers running across the field was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A person who streaks or marks with a different color or substance.
meanings.sent1: The artist used streakers of paint to create a unique masterpiece.
meanings.sent2: The streakers of color added vibrancy to the painting.
meanings.sent3: The streakers of glitter on the card made it sparkle.
meanings.sent4: The streakers of ink on the canvas formed an abstract pattern.
meanings.sent5: The streakers of light transformed the room into a magical space.

meanings.definition: A person who has a continuous period of success or good luck.
meanings.sent1: The team's winning streak attracted many fans to the games.
meanings.sent2: The business owner was considered a streaker in the industry.
meanings.sent3: The lucky streaker seemed to have a golden touch in everything.
meanings.sent4: The streaker of good fortune never seemed to end for him.
meanings.sent5: The streaker of success inspired others to aim higher.
